CustomField.description: If checked, the Apex validation rules will be disabled. Caution! If this custom setting is disabled, your Payment Method may fail due to not being supported by Stripe.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: If checked, the Apex validation rules will be disabled. Caution! If this custom setting is disabled, your Payment Method may fail due to not being supported by Stripe.
CustomField.label: Disable Stripe Support Currency
